product_name: CliniqueEven Better Clinical Serum Foundation Broad Spectrum SPF 25
summary: SummaryHighlightsSustainable PackagingHSA/FSA eligibleClinique Even Better Clinical Serum Foundation is a 24H full-coverage liquid foundation with 3 serum technology.Â Instantly perfects with a matte finish.
details: DetailsBenefitsSkin Types: Combination Oily, Oily24-hour, oil-free foundation with full coverage and a matte finish.Combines the longwearing coverage of a liquid foundation with the transforming power of a serum to help visibly improve skin instantly and over time.Built with 3 serum technology, a powerhouse blend of good-for-skin ingredients: Clinique's dark spot-fighting molecule UP302+ vitamin C, salicylic acid, and hyaluronic acid.Clinically proven to leave bare skin looking even better - smoother and more even.SPF 25 mineral sunscreens help protect skin from the look of discoloration.A non-oxidizing formula for a perfect match that lasts throughout the day.Sweat and humidity-resistant. Waterproof.Dermatologist and ophthalmologist tested.Allergy tested. Fragrance free.Key IngredientsUP302 + Vitamin C: Helps visibly reduce the look of dark spots and uneven skin tone.Salicylic acid: Helps re-texturize skin.Hyaluronic acid: Helps plump up skin for a more youthful look.SPF 25 mineral sunscreen: Helps protect skin from future discoloration.Research Results91% say skin immediately looks perfected.*91% say color stays true throughout the day.*92% say bare skin looks more radiant.**91% see reduced imperfections on bare skin - dark spots, discolorations, age spots, and blemish marks.**90% say bare skin looks smoother and more even-toned.***Consumer testing on 227 women after using product for 1 week.**Consumer testing on 221 women after using product for 8 weeks.Item 2574625How To UseFor best results, apply foundation after moisturizer. Start with just a half-pump; this formula is so concentrated, a little goes a long way. Clinique recommends a buff brush for the most flawless finish, but use your preferred technique. Apply a small amount of foundation where you need coverage the most and blend from there. You can then add more foundation for additional coverage.IngredientsDimethicone, Water\Aqua\Eau, PEG-10 Dimethicone, Butylene Glycol, Vinyl Dimethicone/Methicone Silsesquioxane Crosspolymer, Phenyl Trimethicone, Isododecane, Butyloctyl Salicylate, Isodecyl Isononanoate, Lauryl PEG-9 Polydimethylsiloxyethyl Dimethicone, Alcohol Denat. Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Hydrated Silica, Ascorbyl Glucoside, Tetrahexyldecyl Ascorbate, Magnesium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Laminaria Saccharina Extract, Polygala Senega Root Extract, Berberis Vulgaris Extract, Nymphaea Alba Root Extract, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Salvia Hispanica Seed Extract, Molasses Extract\Saccharum Officinarum\Extrait De MÃ©lasse, Dimethoxytolyl Propylresorcinol, Caffeine, Niacinamide, Salicylic Acid, Linoleic Acid, Tocopherol, Lactoperoxidase, Glucose Oxidase, Lactobacillus Ferment, Glycyrrhetinic Acid, Cholesterol, Jojoba Esters, Glucose, Polysilicone-11, Laureth-7, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Sorbitan Sesquioleate, Lecithin, Xanthan Gum, Silica, Caprylyl Glycol, Dimethicone/PEG-10/15 Crosspolymer, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Alumina, Propylene Carbonate, Dipropylene Glycol, Sodium Chloride, Sodium Hydroxide, Citric Acid, Potassium Phosphate, Tetrasodium EDTA, Sodium Citrate, Potassium Sorbate, Phenoxyethanol, Mica, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491), Iron Oxides (CI 77492), Iron Oxides (CI 77499).Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up to date list of ingredients.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: For best results, apply foundation after moisturizer. Start with just a half-pump; this formula is so concentrated, a little goes a long way. Clinique recommends a buff brush for the most flawless finish, but use your preferred technique. Apply a small amount of foundation where you need coverage the most and blend from there. You can then add more foundation for additional coverage.

reviews.headline: Beware Fair Skin! Yellow Tint is in the Cool Shades!
reviews.comments: I'm wondering if maybe the shades are mislabeled as yellow tint should not be in cool shades.  Cool is for pink undertones for a reason.  I first used the shade finder to match the Clinique foundation to another brand that suits my skin tone.  The shade finder was way off!.  It matched me to a shade that I automatically knew would be too dark for my fair complexion so I chose one that was a little lighter in color (CN10).  When I received it, it was also too dark and was yellow but should have had a pink color to it.  I took it back to the store hoping they would swap it for a lighter shade.  The only two options left was CN08 or CN02, according to the website, both of these are cool shades.  With help from an Ulta employee, I chose the CN02.  I took it home, put it on this morning at it is YELLOW!  I can't believe this!  That is the reason that I am giving this foundation a 3 star is because of the yellow tint in the cool shades.  The makeup itself I do like because it lasts all day and helps to control my oil.

reviews.headline: Flawless, fresh, and never heavy, my new go-to foundation!
reviews.comments: Love, love, love this foundation! It goes on so smooth, feels lightweight, and never looks heavy. I love that it has serum skincare benefits built in and SPF 25 for protection. It lasts all day, keeps my skin looking fresh, and gives a beautiful natural finish. Best foundation I've ever used!

reviews.headline: Love product/Hate shape of bottle!
reviews.comments: I absolutely love the product.  Light weight but yet covers nicely.    I do have to say I hate the shape of the bottle as it is not very travel friendly being tear shaped.   Doesn't fit in cosmetic bags that great.

reviews.headline: Shows every pore
reviews.comments: I thought this foundation would be better for aging skin but when applying it, it seeps into every crevice and pore. It was not flattering. I decided to give this away to someone else after trying it the one time.

reviews.headline: Bought it for my mother in law
reviews.comments: She loves it and makes her look younger.

reviews.headline: Extremely disappointing
reviews.comments: I'm so very disappointed with Clinique. I've been using their products for nearly 30 years. Their current selection of foundations is the worst ever. They discontinued Stay Matte, my favorite. I'll be returning this "Even Better" formula, it's absolutely the worst!

reviews.headline: Terrible
reviews.comments: This foundation is terrible. Does not last all day, separates, shows pores, highlights any wrinkles or texture. Would not recommend, eapecially at the price point.

reviews.headline: Good, but...
reviews.comments:
The product looked good initially. I wanted something to hold up while outdoors in summer heat. I sweated it off quickly, and somehow looked very pale. 

I'm recommending because it's good- just not for what I wanted.

reviews.headline: Best makeup out there!!!
reviews.comments: I have never had such a great experience with makeup as I do this! It's full coverage but feels light and non sticky to the touch! It's my new go to!

reviews.headline: Rethinking this product
reviews.comments: I have been using this product for years. The coverage is good but it feels sticky and greasy on my skin. I might search for another foundation.

reviews.headline: I wanted to love it...
reviews.comments: I have used Clinique foundations in the past that have worked well with my skin, but this one was terrible. It started to dry the moment it touched my skin which made it very difficult to blend. Within an hour it had separated and settled into my pores. I tried using a primer first, but that did nothing to help the settling or separation. It looked terrible. I definitely would not recommend this foundation.

reviews.headline: WOW!! ðŸ©·
reviews.comments: I got this foundation on a whim, i havent worn clinique foundation in more than a decade. And I am soooo happy I tried this. Its similar to the YSL all hours but i actually like this more. It lasts all day, and doesnt settle into lines or cling to dry spots. 10/10 recommend!!

reviews.headline: Horrible
reviews.comments: Foundation comes off easily .

reviews.headline: Do like Clinque
reviews.comments: Smooth on my skin, covers my discolor age spots

reviews.headline: Love the coverage!
reviews.comments: I love this product. It matches and blends so well.

reviews.headline: My foundation
reviews.comments: It matches perfectly. Love it !

reviews.headline: I would buy again
reviews.comments: Great product Dave feels smooth.

reviews.headline: Literally the best foundation I've tried in a long time!
reviews.comments: This is beautiful! It goes on smooth, covers perfectly,does not oxidize, feels like nothing and that was 2 small pumps. I am a foundation junkie. I have used every brand from drugstore to extremely high end and this is unmatched. I urge you to try it. It looks perfect. I would absolutely buy again.

reviews.headline: I love
reviews.comments: I have not found a full coverage foundation like this! I love the amount of coverage you get and all the benefits your skin gets along with it. I am shade Alabaster & it matches me perfectly!

reviews.headline: I love
reviews.comments: I have not found a full coverage foundation like this! I love the amount of coverage you get and all the benefits your skin gets along with it. I am shade Alabaster & it matches me perfectly!

media.headline: Worst foundation I have ever bought!
media.caption: This is by lunch! I don't sweat I work in a nice cool office :;

media.headline: I will only buy this product as my foundation.
Good coverage and good for your skin.

faceoff_positive.comments: I was looking for a new foundation and I have sensitive skin which is acne prone and being in my early 50's it's a pain.  I have warm/neutral undertones to my light/medium skin. I do find Clinique to be a bit warm in their shades for light/medium warm undertones. At first I was shade matched with CN40 which was a tad too pink. Then shade matched to WN38. Both work but I like the WN38 Stone better even if it's a tad too warm. The foundation is full coverage and I find it does not settle into my lines/wrinkles as long as I don't use too much. I have dry skin and this works for me as long as my face is prepped properly with a good moisturizer.  I put on my face sunscreen moisturizer and follow with Clinique's Dramatically Different Moisturizing lotion.  If I need to during the day I spritz my face with the Moisture Surge spray. I think in the summer months this foundation will be perfect formula for my dry skin - even not in the cooler months it's fine. Hopefully I will be able to find a summer shade next summer. Bonus - this does not irritate my skin or cause me to break out.  A win in my book.
faceoff_positive.headline: Nice find

faceoff_negative.comments: I used the Even Better foundation before I tried the Even Better Clinical foundation. I thought I would try this product due to boasting about additional benefits to your skin and while I like to hide my imperfections, I would also like my skin to look better without make-up since I'm not an everyday full face of make-up kind of person. I think the problem with this formula is that they are trying to do too many things all in one product and it is throwing off the chemical balance of the product and how it actually looks on the skin. At the end of the day, I am still buying this product because it is a foundation, not a serum and I expect it to look nice. While I had no problems with the look of the Even Better foundation, the Even Better clinical I struggled to make it not look cakey from the first moment I put it on. Through out the rest of the day, it settled into my pores and fine lines and just looked more splotchy the longer I had it on. Just buy the Even better foundation and save yourself the money and headache.
faceoff_negative.headline: Save the money and buy the even better instead
